works.description:
This letter is from the legal department  
of Acne.org.  We write to demand that you remove the copyrighted content  
from your website at www.monzavenue.com and cease from infringing such  
content in the future.

As you may know, Mr. Kern operates the website at <acne.org> (“the  
Website”), which offers high quality skin care and acne products under the  
ACNE.ORG name, a distinctive forum for user discussion and commentary on  
acne, and extensive information and consumer guidance on acne, medications  
and scar treatments (collectively, the “Website Materials”).  Mr. Kern has  
developed the Website Materials over many years, and takes very seriously  
any infringing use of such content for any purpose. Mr. Kern is the  
exclusive owner of all copyrights in and to the Website Materials.  
Therefore, your copying violates Mr. Kern’s copyright right pursuant to the  
Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. § 101 et seq.

Specifically, our investigation has revealed that the www.bdfunzone.com  
website contains the following material copied from the acne.org website:
